name: The Backrooms Text Game
description:
Welcome to The Backrooms Text Game.

This is a text-based survival game set in the most famous liminal space of all, the Backrooms.  Try to survive as long as you can until your inevitable death or with enough determination, escape the mono-yellow halls once and for all.

There's items for gather, wanderers to meet, and a few more unwelcoming creatures to escape from within the original Level 0.

Thank You for Downloading and Playing The Backrooms Text Game!
